articles.title: Stocks dive on surging inflation, Ukraine risks; China markets sell-off - Reuters.com
articles.description: Asian shares extended a global slump on Friday after the fastest U.S. inflation in four decades and a hawkish European Central Bank (ECB) bolstered expectations for more aggressive rate hikes, hammering sentiment already stung by the Ukraine war.
